title: Installation issue: gcc 10.1 does not build on macOS
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install <spec>
$ spack spec gcc @10.1.0 target=x86_64 %clang@11.0.3-apple
Input spec
--------------------------------
gcc@10.1.0%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-None-x86_64

Concretized
--------------------------------
gcc@10.1.0%clang@11.0.3-apple~binutils languages=c,c++,fortran ~nvptx patches=bd9232c6431fa4063c62e35db4a7aeb9dbe050534b67554a6c37cd7df5e73ceb,ecc5ac43951b34cbc5db15f585b4e704c42e2e487f9ed4c24fadef3f3857930b ~piclibs~strip arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^gmp@6.1.2%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
        ^autoconf@2.69%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
            ^m4@1.4.18%clang@11.0.3-apple patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,c0a408fbffb7255fcc75e26bd8edab116fc81d216bfd18b473668b7739a4158e,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
                ^libsigsegv@2.12%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
            ^perl@5.30.2%clang@11.0.3-apple+cpanm+shared+threads arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
                ^gdbm@1.18.1%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
                    ^readline@8.0%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
                        ^ncurses@6.2%clang@11.0.3-apple~symlinks+termlib arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
                            ^pkgconf@1.6.3%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
        ^automake@1.16.2%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
        ^libtool@2.4.6%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^isl@0.21%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^libiconv@1.16%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^mpc@1.1.0%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
        ^mpfr@4.0.2%clang@11.0.3-apple patches=8f15fd27ab65341a60d724d594897d32f4597ddf642d0dc121995e2150181b0c arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
            ^autoconf-archive@2019.01.06%clang@11.0.3-apple arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^zlib@1.2.11%clang@11.0.3-apple+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
    ^zstd@1.4.3%clang@11.0.3-apple+pic arch=darwin-catalina-x86_64
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1059-1367b63e9
* **Python:** 3.7.3
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-skylake
```

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

https://gist.github.com/eschnett/acae32979d0a7dfc8e080fdf50868fd5

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
